programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Rupert’S Wild Scooter Ride - Rupert and his friends chase all over Nutwood when Ping Pong's spell accidentaly makes his scooter run away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rupert And The Undersea Adventure - Undersea adventures when Rupert, Bill and Ping Pong have to rescue Miranda the Mermaid from the clutches of a Giant Clam.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: A Time To Be Quiet. A Time To Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep53

programme.desc: It's time for a spring clear out - JoJo and Gran Gran are having a spring clear out, but when Gran Gran wants to clear out her old jumper, JoJo is distraught - she loves that snuggly jumper!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: The Beautiful Game - Monty, Jimmy Jones and Stan are preparing to play a game of soccer, but when they realise they don't have the proper gear to play, Stan abandons the match, leaving Monty questioning whether you can only play a game if you have all the correct equipment.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Half a Pair - After playing in the mud, Monty and Stan decide to give Jimmy Jones a bath, but when Stan can only find one glove from his pair, he tells Monty that half a pair of something is useless, leading Monty to wonder if there are any other uses for a half of a pair.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Slam the Door / JAILBREAK! - Harl attempts to prevent Tippy from bringing the fabled 'Mars Door' back to Earth. // Tippy Dorman, faces the trial of the century after his attempt to take over the world.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep102
programme.desc: BURT! The Musical / Sunday No FunDay - When Angus accidentally throws Burt away, he and Parker must get him back from Greenwood's Recycle King. // After Angus tells Parker and Russell to leave the house on his day off, Parker wrongly assumes it's permanent.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Chimpmania - Jeanette and the Chipmunks orchestrate a break-in at Bocarter's house to rescue a chimpanzee he keeps in a cage.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Dad Jokes - Alvin is alarmed that Dave will be hosting an auction where he'll have to tell jokes because he's not that funny.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep420
programme.desc: The Chosen Chipmunk - Alvin sneaks into Simon's new virtual reality game and is transported to a world in desperate need of a hero.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Double Dangus - The chipmunks discover Officer Dangus has a twin brother that's a bully and encourage Dangus to stand up to him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Wedding of the Trentury - Captain Man & Danger Force offer to host the ultimate wedding for Swellview's beloved newscaster Trent Overunder and his online girlfriend Tracy426. When they suspect Tracy426 isn't who she claims to be, their meddling threatens to ruin the big day.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Mindwalk - Desperate to warn Starfleet of their dilemma, a daring experiment goes awry as Dal inadvertently swaps minds with a Starfleet Vice Admiral.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Guess Who's Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie - Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Power Play with the Casagrandes / Room for Improvement with the Casagrandes - When a high utility bill threatens Hector and Rosa's annual trip, Ronnie Anne spearheads an effort to lower usage. // Desperate for their own space, Ronnie Anne and Sid find a hidden room and try to keep it a secret from the other tenants.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Legend of the Gunting - Nate has multiple detentions on the docket, per usual. But this time he is one detention away from a fate only whispered about in the halls of P.S. 38 AND the unhinged new kid is determined to become Nate's prank partner

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep78
programme.desc: Born To Be Wild / Best Frenemies - SpongeBob hears that a ferocious biker gang is coming to town, so SpongeBob prepares to protect the town all by himself. // A new Kelp Smoothy chain is opening up all over Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep93
programme.desc: Blackjack - SpongeBob's parents are missing.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Side Hustle / Burt Speaks - Parker picks up a bunch of side hustles in order to afford the perfect gift for Angus. // Parker believes Burt can speak via popping bubble wrap, and pretty soon, the whole mountain seeks Burt's wisdom.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Fool's Paradise / Job Insecurity - With prankster Luan at camp for April Fool's Day, the Louds think they're safe. That is, until they break down in front of an unusual motel. // The kids discover Dad isn't at his IT job anymore and is now a dishwasher.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Yes Man / Friend or Faux - The sisters enlist the "Master of Convincing" (AKA Lincoln) to teach them how to ask Mom and Dad for money. // Lisa gets her report card and finds she's failed 'social skills'. To bring up her grade, she must make a friend.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk - Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party - Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tooth Hurts / The Middlemost Toast - Parker accidentally loses one of Russell's teeth and hurries to find a replacement before Angus finds out. // On Free Toast Day at the Middlemost Toast, Parker does whatever it takes to make sure Angus enjoys the holiday.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep7
programme.desc: Hall Monitor / Jellyfish Jam - Mrs. Puff's Boating School picks SpongeBob as this weeks Hall Monitor. // Over the repeated warning of his friends, SpongeBob takes a wild jellyfish home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep8
programme.desc: Sandy's Rocket / Squeaky Boots - Sandy has taken on the enviable mission of taking a rocket ship into outer space. // Mr. Krabs surreptitiously gives SpongeBob a pair of squeaky boots in lieu of pay.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep9
programme.desc: Nature Pants / Opposite Day - SpongeBob decides to leave his industrialized life and live off the land with the jellyfish. // Fed up with SpongeBob and Patrick, Squidward decides to sell his house.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep10
programme.desc: Culture Shock / F.U.N. - There's a talent show at the Krusty Krab and Squidward takes over the planning. // The evil Plankton tries to steal a Krusty Krabs' Krabby Patty.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Hometown Hero - When Mantis returns to his hometown claiming to be the Dragon Warrior to impress his ex-fiancé, Po pretends to be his sidekick who doesn't know kung fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Challenge Day - Shifu tells the citizens of the Valley of Peace that whoever can defeat Po before sunset will become the new Dragon Warrior. When Hundun hears of the challenge, he returns to the village to claim the title.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Winter Solstice Part 2: Avatar Roku - During the winter solstice, Aang must reach a Fire Nation temple while dodging Prince Zuko, Commander Zhao, and the Fire Sages who guard it.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Hello, Dollface - The toy manufacturer of Rico's doll-girlfriend has upgraded their doll line with a voice chip.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Dr. Blowhole's Revenge - The penguins’ dolphin nemesis, Dr. Blowhole, is out for revenge. After Blowhole takes King Julien hostage, Skipper and gang must rush to rescue their annoying neighbor and stop evil Dr. Blowhole before he destroys the planet.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Out of the Groove / Jungle Law - Julien is horrified when the baboons' dance routine gets more attention than his own. His attempts to sabotage the baboons blow up in his face. // There's a blackout and Julien convinces everyone they should revert to "jungle law" with him as king.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pizzawinners / Yeasterday - SwaySway and Buhdeuce meet their match when two punker cranes start delivering pizza on their turf. // Buhdeuce has a bad day, so he eats Yeasterday Bread, reliving the same day over and over with bad results for SwaySway.

programme.desc: Slow And Steady/Ricky's Rules - A toppled tree in the savannah stops the Bunnies on their journey, but Bop thinks it makes a great obstacle course!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep29/Ep25
programme.desc: Cutie-Twee Safari/Fighting Back - Alice loves adventures in the wilderness. So imagine her joy at having the opportunity to accompany her friends on a trip to look for CutieTwees.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep225/Ep252
programme.desc: An Open Book/The Tillie Show - Hugo is trying to finish his new book, but Fig keeps interrupting him! Can Esme and Roy find a way for them both to have fun?

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep107/Ep152
programme.desc: A Tea For Sylvus/The Wise Lizard - The Dream Tree is sick! Blackened chhinanas are falling from it, raining down on to the Monchhichi!

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep124/Ep128
programme.desc: Wild Wild Thunderfoot/Have You Herd? - When the Tinhorns trap Thunderfoot through dumb luck, the Dino Ranchers need to set the wild spinosaurus free before the Tinhorns get themselves in real trouble.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep329/Ep324
programme.desc: Squirrel It Away In Big Sky Park/A Yeti Sleepover In Bsp - The gang makes buddy bracelets, but Stomper's is stolen by a squirrel.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep119/Ep138
programme.desc: My Muddy Buddy/The Disappearing Mushler - When Lilit creates a ‘friends tree’ mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep2B/Ep54B/Ep107B/Ep12B/Ep64B/Ep117A/Ep22B
programme.desc: Sun Valley Freeze/Tour De Bugs/In Cold Fudd/Scarecrow/Timmmmmmbugs/Daffy Duck: Motivational Guru/Fwee Wange Wabbit - Bugs finds himself off the beaten path with Bigfoot when they realise some hazmat suit-wearing hunters are pursuing them. Bugs must do everything he can to protect Bigfoot.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep2/Ep50
programme.desc: Members Only/Mr. Weiner - When Daffy realizes the country club is open to members only, he determines to gain access and take full advantage of all it offers. Bugs meets his dream girl: Lola Bunny.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep7/Ep15/Ep28/Ep39/Ep52/Ep63/Ep76
programme.desc: Chickie's Return/Double Dog/Muscle Mike/Robotix 3000/Who's the Boss?/Best in Show/Mike flu - Mike's worst nightmare comes true when Louise finds her old toy, Chickie. Chickie is a horrifying squeaky toy and Mike can't bear to be near it. A perfect solution for the racoons.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep14/Ep59/Ep74/Ep116/Ep5/Ep60/Ep13/Ep31
programme.desc: Cat Fishin'/Love that Pup/Night Before Christmas/Tom's Photo Finish/The Bodyguard/Mice Follies/Cat Concerto/The Flying Cat - Tom tries to use Jerry as the bait for his fishing trip.

programme.title: Pat The Dog Ep46/Ep49/Ep207/Ep208/Ep227/Ep222/Ep223/Ep224
programme.desc: Geocaching/Dances with Fleas/Guanos And Juliet/Tank Gets The Blues/Anything for Little George/The Mask/Special Delivery/Tank Gets Amnesia - Lola's mother has installed a Geocaching application on her daughter's phone. Lola is over the moon and heads outside to start playing.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep104/Ep43/Ep4/Ep26/Ep77
programme.desc: The Birthday To End All Birthdays: Part 2/Election Day/Crushing Defeat/Buggin' Out/Wiener Club - Following the events of Master Frown's birthday, Unikitty and her friends form a resistance group to restore the Unikingdom.

programme.title: Chowder Ep2B/Ep34B/Ep13A/Ep44A
programme.desc: Chowder's Girlfriend/Big Food/The Vacation/A Little Bit of Pizzazz - When Panini sets her love-struck eyes on Chowder, he tries every trick he can think of to convince her he's not her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep125/Ep167/Ep210/Ep136/Ep177
programme.desc: Viral Spiral/Monkey Love/The Gift/Poorbucks/Toy Ploy - When the Amoeba Boys wreak havoc on the Internet, Bubbles has to hack her sisters in to stop them.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep125/Ep164/Ep204/Ep226/Ep260
programme.desc: All Wet/Bounty Ball/Lickety Split/Vin Diagram/Xingo's World - No one believes Ben when he insists that one of the other patrons, waiting in line at the World of Wet Water Park, is the nefarious Frightwig, disguised as a common girl.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep24/Ep13
programme.desc: Bye Bye Nerdy/Who Let the Dogs in? - When Bloo discovers that Mac is a nerd, he sets out to 'cool-up' his kid. But what will Bloo do when Mac becomes too cool for his best friend?

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep1/Ep25
programme.desc: House of Bloo's Part 1/Bloo Done It - When 8-yr-old Mac is forced to give up his Imaginary Friend Bloo, they find Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends, an amazing house for unwanted Imaginary Friends. Their problems appear to be solved until a sinister plot by an evil Imaginary Friend puts Bloo in peril. Now Mac and his new friends from Foster's must work together to save Mac's best buddy Bloo.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep26/Ep48/Ep81/Ep69/Ep97
programme.desc: Buggin' Out/Landlord Lord/Bedtime Stories/Career Day/Borrowed - When Unikitty and the gang discover a gross bug in the castle, they want it gone - but Unikitty refuses to allow them to squash it!

programme.title: Pat The Dog Ep48/Ep51/Ep213/Ep214/Ep233/Ep228/Ep229/Ep230
programme.desc: Eyes Wide Open/The Guanos/Summersaults Under The Stars/Without A Sound/Tiki To The Limit/The Friendship Letter/The Recruit/Where Is My Phone? - Hoodie has an eye infection and must wear a special protective bubble. Lola asks Pat to look after him. The Guanos naturally decide this is the perfect occasion to get rid of the kitten.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep77A/Ep66B/Ep34B/Ep21A/Ep9B
programme.desc:
Crazy Mixed Up Puffs/Coupe D'Etat/Catastrophe/Mo Job/The Bare Facts - The girls must literally work as one to try and stop Mojo from
destroying Townsville.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep3/Ep49
programme.desc: Jailbird And Jailbunny/Here Comes The Pig - During a trip to the Grand Canyon National Park, a careless act by Daffy Duck lands him and Bugs Bunny in the big house -- prison!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep251/Ep252
programme.desc: Fangsgiving/The Tillie Show - Simon is super excited to celebrate Fangsgiving. But when things don’t go according to plan, he learns the true meaning of the holiday.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep149/Ep150
programme.desc: King Willow/Cactus Mission - After the Trio wins a battle, Willow grabs Aikor's scepter and the magician retreats. Sylvus asks the little Chhichi to dispose of it but Willow is fascinated by it and keeps it hidden.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep140/Ep113
programme.desc: Morel In The Dark/The Hero Trap - When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep325/Ep328
programme.desc: Sam ‘N Go Seek In Big Sky Park/A Rainy Ranger Day - During a game of Sam ‘n Seek, Rob, Stomper and Dakota try to find Sam hiding in the jungle.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep121/Ep143
programme.desc: A Dragon Tale/Savannah Race - In the Savannah, Bop and Boo befriend Zhenya the ZEBRA, who loves to read. She shows them the big green dragon in her book!

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings Ep3/Ep14/Ep23/Ep35/Ep47/Ep63/Ep73
programme.desc: Cellular Bear/Thirst Quencher/Bear's Best Friend/Lemming Airlines/Bear Prints/Snow Lemmings/Halloween Bear - Grizzy's nap is interrupted by an annoying vibration. He sees the forest ranger's cell phone on the couch.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep23/Ep24
programme.desc: A Haunting In Crystal Cove/Dead Justice - Mayor Jones is under attack by a poltergeist in his own home, and the only ones who can help him are the Scooby gang.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep2B/Ep5C/Ep9A/Ep13A/Ep17C/Ep21C/Ep23A
programme.desc: Fraidycat Scat/Abracadumb/Joy Riding Jokers/Tin Cat of Tomorrow/Jungle Love/Game, Set, Match/Hockey Schtick - Jerry lives a life of luxury in an old, abandoned mansion until Tom moves in.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep125/Ep133
programme.desc: Chefs/Monkey See, Monkey Do - Returning to the Mountains, the Brave Bunnies find Lara, their LLAMA friend, at her toy kitchen, pretending to make her doll Lulu's favorite vegetable stew.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep28/Ep26
programme.desc: Crazy Hide And Seek/The Painting - Alice has bought herself a gorgeous new cap but gets laughed at when she wears it to school. Seriously embarrassed, she escapes to Wonderland.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep226/Ep229
